author: cecilecaillol
body:
#### PR description:

Added calotaus, phase1 and seeded-cone puppijets (saved with new naming convention), displaced tkjets (also met and ht), glb standalone muons, glbmuons, and tkmuons (also the usual standalone muons). 

PR validation: Produces correct ntuples :)

    This PR suggests a new naming scheme for jets that (hopefully) clarifies the approach used for them:
    unless otherwise specified in the names, the objects rely on puppi.
    In practice:
    pfPhase1L1Jet --> phase1Jet
    puppiJet (rely on the seededConeProducer) --> seededConeJet

However, if one would use for example PF, this would be added to the object name so that phase1Jet --> phase1PFJet.
Clarifying the variable names is a part of the ntuplizer cleaning process, and we will aim to provide a README for future users where the naming scheme is explained in detail.

#### PR validation:

Rebase of https://github.com/cms-l1t-offline/cmssw/pull/904 and https://github.com/cms-l1t-offline/cmssw/pull/884

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

Rebase of https://github.com/cms-l1t-offline/cmssw/pull/904 and https://github.com/cms-l1t-offline/cmssw/pull/884
title: L1T phase-2: code to produce menu ntuples
